author: asianlego
title: Lego on The Go
review: There is nothing much in these canisters other than plain bricks which will soon be mixed up with the other bricks in my bigger tub. One thing I like about the canister is that it stacks with the studded LEGO buckets, be it below or above.  These were for sale really cheap to, and serves as a cheap way to get bulk bricks.

author: 04smallmj
title: I wish they still made these...
review: I got 2 of these a while ago, to increase the amount of bricks in my collection, but without buying a huge box. The only thing I hate about the elements it contains, is the 2 1X1 "eye" bricks, as I have no use for them. Other than that, a very good set.

author: AETerry
title: Cheap Way to get Bricks
review:
That's about the only reason I found to buy this canister when I saw it out, was to get bricks in bulk for building with.

 

There's a set of instructions for ideas on what to build with them.

 

Other then that, if you wanted bricks and a way to get a lot of them cheap, this is one way to go.
